name: Flight Training Centers - Westfield
about: Flight Training Centers - Westfield is a premier flight training institution located in Westfield, Indiana. With additional locations in Kokomo and Sheridan, we offer a comprehensive range of flight training programs tailored to both recreational and professional pilots. Our programs include the Sport Pilot license, Private Pilot license, Instrument Rating, and Multi-Engine Rating. We provide affordable and flexible training options, including a 20-minute Discovery Flight for just $99, allowing aspiring pilots to experience flying with a Certified Flight Instructor. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that students receive top-notch training to achieve their aviation goals. Whether you're just starting out or looking to enhance your skills, Flight Training Centers - Westfield is dedicated to helping you soar to new heights.
